# Coding the Future with AI - Financial Overview Q4 2025

## Revenue Streams

### Consulting & Advisory
- **Enterprise AI Strategy Workshops**: $15,000-25,000 per engagement
- **Fractional AI Leadership**: $8,000/month retainer (2 active clients)
- **Technical Architecture Reviews**: $5,000 per review

### Training & Education
- **Claude Code Mastery Bootcamp**: $2,500/participant (cohort-based, 8-12 participants)
- **AI-Native Development Workshop**: $1,800/participant (4-hour intensive)
- **Custom Corporate Training**: $12,000-20,000 per program

### Products & Recurring
- **AI Readiness Assessment Tool**: $500 one-time license
- **Monthly Office Hours Subscription**: $200/month (currently 45 subscribers)

## Q4 2025 Financial Summary

| Category | Revenue | % of Total |
|----------|---------|------------|
| Consulting | $72,000 | 48% |
| Training | $54,000 | 36% |
| Products | $24,000 | 16% |
| **Total** | **$150,000** | 100% |

## Expenses

### Fixed Monthly
- Software & Tools: $850 (Claude API, Anthropic subscription, hosting)
- Accounting & Legal: $400
- Marketing & Content: $600
- Insurance: $200

### Variable
- Subcontractor fees (workshop facilitation): 15% of workshop revenue
- Travel & client meetings: ~$1,200/month average

## Profit Margin
- **Gross margin**: 72%
- **Net margin after all expenses**: 58%

## Q1 2026 Projections
- Two new enterprise clients in pipeline (est. $40,000 combined)
- Claude Code Bootcamp cohort 4 launching (12 confirmed, 8 waitlist)
- Exploring partnership with dev bootcamp for AI curriculum licensing

## Key Financial Principles
1. Maintain 6-month operating reserve at all times
2. Reinvest 20% of net profit into product development
3. Keep fixed costs under 15% of revenue
4. Client concentration: no single client > 25% of revenue
